content.text:
# Faculty award

Faculty awards are given to faculty in recognition of outstanding contributions in research, teaching, and/or service to their university, students, profession, or field.
See also
*Faculty (academic staff)
*Higher education
*University
* List of education awards
References
External links
*[https://mup.asu.edu/ Center for Measuring University Performance]
*[http://ofr.fsu.edu/Faculty-Awards/Faculty-Awards-and-University Faculty Awards and University Ranking], Florida State University
*[http://www.research.ibm.com/university/awards/faculty_innovation.shtml IBM University Awards]
*[http://compact.org/initiatives/awards-programs/the-thomas-ehrlich-civically-engaged-faculty-award/ The Thomas Ehrlich Civically Engaged Faculty Award]
*[http://www.vanderbilt.edu/provost/faculty-highlights/ Vanderbilt University Faculty Awards]
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20160413002936/http://www.darpa.mil/work-with-us/opportunities/Universities/Young_Faculty Young Faculty Award] (DARPA)
*[https://www.iitm.ac.in/yfra Young Faculty Award] (IITM)
